text: viśvāsavantayini! oba allāhṭa udav karannan bavaṭa pat vanu. maryamgē put īsā (tamangē) gōlayinṭa “allāh venuven maṭa udav karannā kavarekda?”yi vimasū avasthāvēdī “api allāh venuven udav karannemu” yayi ema gōlayin pævasū andamaṭama (viśvāsavantayini! obat allāhṭa udav karannan bavaṭa pat vanu). ehet isrāyīla paramparāvē daruvangen ek (kuḍā) samūhayakma (ohuva) viśvāsa kaḷaha. anit (viśāla) samūhayak (ohuva) pratikṣēpa kaḷaha. ebævin viśvāsa kaḷa ovunṭa ovungē saturan kerehi (jayagrahaṇaya kirīmaṭa) apima udav kaḷemu. ebævin ovun jayagrahaṇaya kaḷaha
